name: Tomato & Herb Pasta
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions
Saut√© diced tomato in olive oil (no onion/garlic)
Toss cooked pasta with tomato sauce
Add fresh basil and season with salt and pepper

name: Chickpea & Cucumber Salad
steps: Mix all vegetables in a bowl
Dress with lemon juice and olive oil

name: Cheese & Herb Omelette
steps: Beat eggs with milk in a bowl
Heat butter in a pan over medium heat
Pour egg mixture and cook gently
Add cheese and herbs when eggs are nearly set
Fold omelette in half and serve
